column2: 2015 dr. donald a. vichick md passed away from us on june 9
column3: 2015 in his home surround by his children and grandchildren. he is survived by his wife of 55 years
column7: susan johnson and sarah jane vichick. he also had nine grandchildren and four great grandchildren as well as a sister
column8: diana fox. doctor vichick was a graduate of cornell university and cornell medical school. he retired as a colonel from the us army medical corps. his life was filled with fixing people and racing his porsche. we shall all miss him in our lives and hearts.
